definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: She edged the pillowcase with lace.
High quality and comfortable pillowcases are usually expensive.
sentences.chinese: 高品質又舒服的枕頭套通常都很貴。

sentences.english: Place the zippered end into the pillowcase first.
sentences.chinese: 將保護套帶拉鍊的一端先放入枕頭套中。

sentences.english: Rubber gloves and non-skid footwear are recommended when working outdoors. Wear protective hair covering to contain long hair.
sentences.chinese: 室外作業建議帶橡膠手套和防滑鞋，束縛長髮的頭套。

sentences.english: The Ewok costumes were five-piece affairs with sculpted heads.
sentences.chinese: 伊沃克人道具服由5片拼綴而成，外加雕刻的頭套。

sentences.english: Put equal handfuls of dried hops and lavender flowers into a cotton pillowcase, and seal the end.
sentences.chinese: 把等量的幹酒花和幹薰衣草放進棉枕頭套中並封口。

definition: fully armed/armed to the teeth/fig. fully equipped
cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
